channel.title: PROJECT LithiumScape - You Decide the Updates! - Update Tally: 2 -
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i160.photobucket.com/albums/t167/nirvanasmarijuana/Untitled-1.png[/img]
Server Base: Winterloves.
Welcome to the Project Lithium Development. I need all suggestions. All (decent) suggestions will be added to the server.
So please post suggestions..
Updates: - Added Objects. - Got Gfx Working. -
Currently Working on: - Animations. - Npcs. - Combat.
